<entry name="Eldar/AssuredDestructionFlavor" value="“Se um capitão for tolo o suficiente para permitir que cinco Aeldari com meltaguns e milênios de experiência em combate se aproximem a 20 metros de seu tanque… bem, francamente, ele merece ser um poça de ichor derretida no chão.”
— Comissário Gruber"/> <entry name="Eldar/AsuryaniArrivals" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/AsuryaniArrivalsDescription" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/AsuryaniArrivalsFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/AutarchsAssault" value=""/>

<entry name="Eldar/TitanHoloFieldsDescription" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/TitanHoloFieldsFlavor" value="“Eu estava assistindo ao melhor show de luz da Colméia, todos elsparks e bang-bangs e brilhos e tão psicodélico… então olhei ao redor e os Irregulares estavam mortos e aquele tanque alienígena passou por mim como se eu fosse plastilina.”
— Soldado Grande, único sobrevivente dos Quartos Irregulares de Necromunda"/> <entry name="Eldar/TranscendentBliss" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/TranscendentBlissDescription" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/TranscendentBlissFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/VectorDancer" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/VectorDancerDescription" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/VectorDancerFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/VectoredEngines" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/VectoredEnginesDescription" value=""/> <entry name="Eldar/VectoredEnginesFlavor" value=""/>

<entry name="LastStandFlavor" value="“Aqui permanecemos e aqui morreremos, inquebráveis e destemidos. Mesmo que a própria mão da morte venha por nós, lançaremos nossa afronta até o fim!”
— Capelão Armand Titus dos Howling Griffons"/>

<entry name="Orks/BonusBeastsProductionFlavor" value="“We's gonna need a bigger whip.”
— Runtherd Gark Snotsmeer, shortly before a Squiggoth stepped on him"/>
<entry name="Orks/BonusInfantryProductionFlavor" value="“Da best shoota I eva made, dat iz. Loadza barrulz, so dat it's ded shooty. 'Sept dat wun, 'cos dat's da skorcha, dat's burny insted. Yeah, good an' propa. An' da bullitz is 'splosiv…dey goez boom inna fings wot you'z shootin.' An' dat button dere…dat's da best bit. Wot it duz, see, iz…iz…oh, zog. Nah, it's nuffin' boss. Nah, you'z don't need ta see wot dat button duz…'onist. Don't push it!”
— Last words, Nazdakka Boomsnik, Mek"/>
<entry name="Orks/BustHeads" value=""/>
<entry name="Orks/BustHeadsFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="Orks/ChannelMentalEmissions" value=""/>
<entry name="Orks/CityGrowthFlavor" value="“Naw, I don't want zogging tweeterz. I want gorkawooferz… wunz that go up ta eleven!”
— Bleeding Ears Merfnik, Goff Warlord and Rocka"/>
<entry name="Orks/CityInfluenceFlavor" value="“I don't knows what dems is, but I wants 'em.”
— Warboss Flashgrub Nitwiz, gazing upon the hammered gold doors of the Basilica Imperialis on Catiline VII"/>
<entry name="Orks/CreateOrkoidFungusOnDeathFlavor" value="“Exhibit 27: a single 'spore' of xenos species #0451 'Ork'. Acolytes, you should note the fungoid texture and microhomuncular structures. We theorise that these 'spores' generate new 'Orks' in any sufficiently fertile setting. When an Ork reaches maturity (typically 30 minutes after emergence) it emits these constantly—but they are released en masse at the moment of death. Please don't drop it.”
— Lecture transcripts, Grigomen “Orklover” Delr, Rogue Trader and amateur Xenologist"/> <entry name="Orks/CyborkImplants" value=""/>
<entry name="Orks/ExtraBitz" value=""/>
<entry name="Orks/ExperimentalProcedure" value=""/>

<entry name="Orks/ProphetOfTheWaaagh" value=""/>

<entry name="PinningFlavor" value=""/>

<entry name="RitesOfWarFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SeekerMissile" value=""/>
<entry name="SeekerMissileFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SignumFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/AssaultWeaponBonusFlavor" value="“The right attack, carefully placed, can defeat the most overwhelming of enemies. However, if we do not know the right attack? Then an overwhelming, inchoate assault will hit the right spot, eventually…”
— Canoness Vandire, In Nomine Strategi"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/AvengingZealFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/BloodyResolutionFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/CatechismOfRepugnance" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/CatechismOfRepugnanceDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/CatechismOfRepugnanceFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/DivineDeliverance" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/DivineDeliveranceDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/DivineDeliveranceFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/EternalCrusadeFlavor" value="“And we shall not rest, for the God-Emperor’s eye is on us. He sees every soul saved and knows that the number imperilled far outweighs it. We cannot stop, we cannot slow—ours is an eternal crusade.”
— Canoness Vandire, In Memoriam De Virtute"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/FlankSpeedFlavor" value="“One should not question the nobility of Questor Imperialis. But for faith, none can match the Knight-Lancer, which goes into battle armed only with a spear and its own prodigious speed, praying that it makes it to the enemy lines. It is a fine match for our forces.”
— Canoness Vandire, In Nomine Strategi"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/HeavyWeaponBonusFlavor" value="“Over the shells of the Castigator, we sprinkle the soil of holy Terra, raise our voices in prayer, and genuflect before the Shrine of St Katherine. Then we add 25% more explosive to each shell and cap them with adamantium.”
— Canoness Vandire, In Nomine Strategi"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/KeepersOfTheFaithFlavor" value="“Reason says, fire when you see the enemy. Reason says, use cover when the enemy fires at you. Reason says, die when you are shot. Reason does not understand our faith and how we keep it.”
— Canoness Vandire, In Nomine Strategi"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/LaudHailerFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/LeadTheRighteous" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/LeadTheRighteousFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/LightOfTheEmperor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/LightOfTheEmperorDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/LightOfTheEmperorFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/MartyrSpiritFlavor" value="“The loss of our Sisters and auxiliaries saddened us—but encouraged us to redouble our efforts.”
— Unknown remembrancer, Gospel of the Webway"/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/MedicusMinistorum" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/MedicusMinistorumFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/MiraculousIntervention" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/MiraculousInterventionDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/MiraculousInterventionFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/OathOfFaithFlavor" value="“We all took an oath, to defend the Imperium, to purge the heretic and alien. It supported us, drove us on through pain and fear. But when our sisters finally broke and fled, our oath haunted them… If they survived their flight, they would return as Sisters Repentia…”
— Unknown remembrancer, Gospel of the Webway"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/ProtectedFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/PsyShockFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/PurifyingRecitationsFlavor" value="“Our foes call us cold, inhuman, unfeeling. But we feel, we mourn, we rage. Let them feel our warmth—in our flamers, our meltas.”
— Canoness Vandire, In Nomine Strategi"/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/RagingFervourFlavor" value="“The weapons in our hands are the instruments of our faith. Each bolt is a prayer sent to the heart of the faithless, spreading its word into their very being.”
— Canoness Vandire, In Nomine Strategi"/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/RighteousJudgement" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/RighteousJudgementDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/RighteousJudgementFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/SaintlyBlessingsFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/SolaceInAnguish" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/SolaceInAnguishDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/SolaceInAnguishFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/StirringRhetoric" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/StirringRhetoricFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/TaleOfTheFaithful" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/TaleOfTheFaithfulDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/TaleOfTheFaithfulFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/TaleOfTheStoic" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/TaleOfTheStoicDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/TaleOfTheStoicFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/TaleOfTheWarrior" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/TaleOfTheWarriorDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/TaleOfTheWarriorFlavor" value=""/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/ThePassion" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/ThePassionFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/UsedActOfFaithFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/VengefulSpiritFlavor" value="“And in death, we have one last chance—a release from worry. Once dying, there is nothing holding back our fury, no need for self-preservation. We can use up all that we are, take all the blow that come our way, for one last chance at justice.”
— Canoness Vandire, In Nomine Strategi"/> <entry name="SistersOfBattle/WarHymn" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/WarHymnFlavor" value=""/>
<entry name="SistersOfBattle/WarmachinesWrathFlavor" value="“In those last days, the fervour spread. The Rite of Suppliance was performed, to demand the utmost from the Machine Spirits that ran the Manufactora and the Hangars where the ancient war engines were anointed. They did not disappoint.”
— Unknown remembrancer, Gospel of the Webway"/> <entry name="SkilledJink" value=""/> <entry name="SkilledJinkDescription" value=""/> <entry name="SkilledJinkFlavor" value=""/>
